name: The Abettor's Letters
blurb: Learn French in this beautiful point-and-click adventure. Explore & interact to practice the French you'll need to solve the mystery.

rewards.reward: No Reward
LE PETIT CHOU CHOU - Our undying thanks, and access to exclusive Kickstarter blog updates.
LE GAMIN - A small digital package of game art, wallpapers, and icons.
LA COQUINE - A large package of game art, wallpapers, and icons, and the digital version of a Kickstarter-exclusive sketchbook.
LE PETIT PRINCE - Digital art package, digital version of a Kickstarter-exclusive sketchbook, and your choice of one 8x10" art print.
LA PARISIENNE - Digital art package, digital version of a Kickstarter-exclusive sketchbook, and your choice of three 8x10" art prints.
L'ESPION - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, and both digital and print versions of a 24-page Kickstarter-exclusive sketchbook.

***EXCLUSIVE BUNDLE: BACKERS WILL RECEIVE ANY & ALL FUTURE EPISODES OF THE ABETTOR'S LETTERS (FRENCH VERSION)*** LE SAINT-GEORGES - 
Any & all episodes of The Abettor's Letters (French version) are yours! These episodes will never again be offered in this subscription format--what a deal! 

In addition, you'll receive the digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, both digital and print versions of a 24-page Kickstarter-exclusive sketchbook, and a pack of 8 postcards.
LE FULL-ON-MONET - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page Kickstarter-exclusive sketchbook, and an extended digital version of the sketchbook.

LES BIJOUX - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, and necklace with stamped red "wax" seal pendant.

LE CARSEN BROOKS - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, and vintage brass monocle necklace with stamped red "wax" seal charm.

LE TOULOUSE-LAUTREC - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, necklace with stamped red "wax" seal pendant, and a miniature original watercolor painting by JoJo Seames of a character of your choice, in an ornate, brightly-colored tabletop frame.

LE NAPOLEON - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, necklace with stamped red "wax" seal pendant, and an original 11x14" watercolor painting by JoJo Seames, of a character of your choice.

LA MARSEILLAISE - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, necklace with stamped red "wax" seal pendant, and an original 11x14" watercolor painting by McCal Joy Johnson, of a French land or cityscape.

LA NOTRE DAME - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, necklace with stamped red "wax" seal pendant, and an original 11x14" painting of yourself in the style of an Abettor's Letters character, by JoJo Seames.

LE MUSKETEER - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, stamped red "wax" seal pendant necklace, and you'll appear in this episode of the game as a character. The original art of your game model is included.

LE BEAUDELAIRE - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, stamped red "wax" seal pendant necklace, and you'll appear in this episode of the game as an interactive character with some personalized dialogue. The original art of your game model is included.

LE MELIES - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, stamped red "wax" seal pendant necklace, an original 16x20" watercolor Abettor's Letters illustration by JoJo Seames, and a personalized video from the team.

LA JEAN D'ARC - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, stamped red "wax" seal pendant necklace, an original 20x30" watercolor Parisian cityscape by McCal Joy Johnson, and a personalized video from the team.

LE ROI SOLEIL - Digital art package, your choice of three 8x10" art prints, pack of 8 postcards, 24-page sketchbook, extended-version digital sketchbook, stamped red "wax" seal pendant necklace, and we'll transform you into the villain of a future episode of the game!
